Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to underground electrical services in Suffolk and Nassau counties
Summary: Requires all new residential and commercial units in Suffolk and Nassau counties, including all structures that have realized repairs or improvements that are equal to or greater than fifty percent of the structure's value, to install underground service drops at such locations.
LawCode: Add ยง54, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to underground electrical services in Suffolk and Nassau counties
